edu.cnm.deepdive.craps.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.craps.model.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    Game implements a simple play engine for the main roll/bet of a game of Craps. Additionally, it can be used to keep tallies across several rounds of play. Side bets are not supported.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(Random rng)
      Initializes this instance with the specified source of randomness.

      Returns established point.

      Constructs and returns a deep (safe) copy of the list of rolls in the current game.

      Returns current state of game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(Random rng)
        Initializes this instance with the specified source of randomness.
        Parameters:
        rng - source of randomness.

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Prepares this instance tp play a round—i.e. returns the game state to State.COME_OUT, clears the established point, and clears the lis of rolls. This method must be invoked prior to play(), even immediately after creating and initializing the instance via Game(Random).

      • play

        public State play()
        Plays one round of Craps, from come-out roll to win or loss. If this is invoked on an instance already in a terminal state (State.WIN or State.LOSS), no exception is thrown, but the state of this Game instance doesn't change.
        Returns:
        terminal state (State.WIN or State.LOSS) of game.

      • getPointValue

        public int getPointValue()
        Returns established point.
        Returns:

      • getState

        public State getState()
        Returns current state of game. This will be the State.COME_OUT state after reset() is invoked, and a terminal state (State.WIN or State.LOSS) after play() is invoked.
        Returns:

      • getRolls

        public List<int[]> getRolls()
        Constructs and returns a deep (safe) copy of the list of rolls in the current game.
        Returns:

      • getWins

        public long getWins()
        Returns the tally of wins recorded since this instance was created and initialized.
        Returns:

      • getLosses

        public long getLosses()
        Returns the tally of losses recorded since this instance was created and initialized.
        Returns:
